block.simplyrandom.coal_generator.toolti: This will make power when you fill it with some coal or other furnace-accepted fuels.
block.simplyrandom.cobblestone_generator: Creates cobblestone as fast as you can extract it, so long as it's conditions are met.
block.simplyrandom.solar_generator.toolt: Generates energy when it can see the sun.
block.simplyrandom.tree_farm.tooltip: Uses a pocket dimension to collect and harvest trees at the cost of power.
